legend_event_general_pm0250_00_houou/520:
Man, I can’t wait to
meet Ho-Oh!

You heard the story from Silver, right? We’re
looking for Ho-Oh!

Bet you wanna see a Legendary Pokémon, too,
right? You should come with us to look for it!

*sigh*
How did I get dragged
into this?

Ethan, that dope... Does he really think it’ll be that
easy to find Ho-Oh?

I hope you’ve already realized what a waste of
time this is... Anyway, c’mon. You can tag along
with us for a bit.
